cc.mallet.extract

Class DocumentViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.mallet.extract.DocumentViewer

  • public class DocumentViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Diagnosis class that outputs HTML pages that allows you to view errors on a more global per-instance basis. Created: Mar 30, 2005
    Version:
    $Id: DocumentViewer.java,v 1.1 2007/10/22 21:37:44 mccallum Exp $
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • writeExtraction

        public static void writeExtraction(java.io.File directory,
                   Extraction extraction)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes several HTML files describing a given extraction. Each HTML file shows an entire document, with the extracted fields color-coded.
        Parameters:
        directory - Directory to write files to
        extraction - Extraction to describe
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
